thread.title: Why The Apple Watch Is A Fashion Girl's Dream And Nightmare

title: Why The Apple Watch Is A Fashion Girl's Dream And Nightmare
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Technology - Today 
Before I started wearing the Apple Watch three months ago, I thought I was done with being so connected. A trip to Tulum, Mexico last summer...
